ui.panel.config.areas.picker.introductio: Područja se koriste za organiziranje gdje su uređaji. Ove informacije će se koristiti u cijelom Home Assistant da vam pomogne u organizaciji sučelja, dopuštenja i integracija s drugim sustavima.
Da biste postavili uređaje u neko područje, pomoću donje veze idite na stranicu s integracijama, a zatim kliknite na konfiguriranu integraciju da biste došli do kartica uređaja.

ui.panel.config.energy.caption: Energy
ui.panel.config.energy.description: Monitor your energy production and consumption
ui.panel.config.energy.new_device_info: After setting up a new device, it can take up to 2 hours for new data to arrive in your energy dashboard.
ui.panel.config.energy.delete_source: Are you sure you want to delete this source?
ui.panel.config.energy.delete_integratio: Are you sure you want to delete this integration? It will remove the entities it provides
ui.panel.config.energy.grid.title: Electricity grid
ui.panel.config.energy.grid.sub: Configure the amount of energy that you consume from the grid and, if you produce energy, give back to the grid. This allows Home Assistant to track your whole home energy usage.
ui.panel.config.energy.grid.learn_more: More information on how to get started.
Grid consumption is the energy that flows from the energy grid to your home.
Select how Home Assistant should keep track of the costs of the consumed energy.
Use an entity tracking the total costs
Use an entity with current price
Grid production is the energy that flows from your solar panels to the grid.
Do you get money back when you return energy to the grid?
I do not get money back
Use an entity tracking the total recieved money
Use an entity with current rate
ui.panel.config.energy.solar.title: Solar Panels
ui.panel.config.energy.solar.sub: Let Home Assistant monitor your solar panels and give you insight on their performance.
ui.panel.config.energy.solar.learn_more: More information on how to get started.
ui.panel.config.energy.solar.stat_return: Solar energy returned to the grid
ui.panel.config.energy.solar.stat_predic: Prediction of your solar energy production
ui.panel.config.energy.solar.dialog.head: Configure solar panels
ui.panel.config.energy.solar.dialog.sola: Adding solar production forecast information will allow you to quickly see your expected production for today.
ui.panel.config.energy.battery.title: Home Battery Storage
ui.panel.config.energy.battery.sub: If you have a battery system, you can configure it to monitor how much energy was stored and used from your battery.
ui.panel.config.energy.battery.learn_mor: More information on how to get started.
ui.panel.config.energy.battery.dialog.en: Energy going in to the battery (kWh)
Energy coming out of the battery (kWh)

ui.panel.config.energy.gas.dialog.cost_p: Select how Home Assistant should keep track of the costs of the consumed energy.
ui.panel.config.energy.gas.dialog.cost_s: Use an entity tracking the total costs

ui.panel.config.energy.gas.dialog.m3_or_: ft³, m³, Wh, kWh, MWh or GJ

Select the entity that represents the device energy usage.

ui.panel.config.automation.caption: Automatizacija
ui.panel.config.automation.picker.introd: Automatizacijski urednik omogućuje stvaranje i uređivanje automatizacije. Molimo pročitajte [upute] (https://home-assistant.io/docs/automation/editor/) kako biste bili sigurni da ste ispravno konfigurirali Home Assistant.

ui.panel.config.automation.picker.only_e: Samo automatizacije definirane u automations.yaml se mogu uređivati.
ui.panel.config.automation.picker.dev_on: Only automations that have a unique ID assigned are debuggable.
ui.panel.config.automation.dialog_new.ho: How do you want to create your new automation?
ui.panel.config.automation.dialog_new.th: Describe the automation you want to create
And we will try to create it for you. For example: Turn the lights off when I leave.
ui.panel.config.automation.dialog_new.st: Create a new automation from scratch

ui.panel.config.automation.editor.traces: Automations need an ID for history to be tracked. Add an ID to your automation to make it available in traces.

ui.panel.config.script.caption: Skripta
ui.panel.config.script.picker.introducti: Urednik skripta omogućuje vam stvaranje i uređivanje skripta. Molimo slijedite donju vezu da biste pročitali upute kako biste bili sigurni da ste ispravno konfigurirali Home Assistant.

ui.panel.config.script.editor.id_already: You can't save this script because the ID is not unique, pick another ID or leave it blank to automatically generate one.
ui.panel.config.script.editor.introducti: Upotrijebite skripte za izvršenje slijeda radnji.
ui.panel.config.script.editor.read_only: This script can not be edited from the UI, because it is not stored in the ''scripts.yaml'' file.
ui.panel.config.script.editor.load_error: Samo skripte u scripts.yaml se mogu uređivati.
Only scripts in scripts.yaml can be deleted.
ui.panel.config.scene.caption: Scene
ui.panel.config.scene.picker.introductio: Urednik scena omogućuje vam stvaranje i uređivanje scena. Molimo slijedite donju vezu da biste pročitali upute kako biste bili sigurni da ste ispravno konfigurirali Home Assistant.

ui.panel.config.scene.picker.only_editab: Samo scene definirane u scenes.yaml se mogu uređivati.
ui.panel.config.scene.editor.load_error_: Samo scene u scenes.yaml se mogu uređivati.
ui.panel.config.scene.editor.name: Ime
ui.panel.config.scene.editor.devices.int: Dodajte uređaje koje želite uključiti u svoju scenu. Postavite sve uređaje na stanje koje želite za ovu scenu.
ui.panel.config.scene.editor.entities.in: Entiteti koji ne pripadaju uređajima mogu se postaviti ovdje.
ui.panel.config.cloud.description_featur: Upravljajte kad ste izvan kuće, integrirajte se s Alexa i Google Assistantom.
ui.panel.config.cloud.login.title: Prijava putem clouda
ui.panel.config.cloud.login.introduction: Home Assistant Cloud vam pruža sigurnu udaljenu vezu s vašom instancom dok ste izvan kuće. Također vam omogućuje povezivanje s uslugama samo u cloudu: Amazon Alexa i Google Assistant.
, tvrtka koju su osnovali osnivači Home Assistanta i Hass.ioa.
Home Assistant Cloud je usluga na pretplatu s besplatnim probnim razdobljem od mjesec dana. Nisu potrebne informacije o plaćanju.
ui.panel.config.cloud.login.learn_more_l: Saznajte više o Home Assistant Cloudu.
ui.panel.config.cloud.login.start_trial: Započnite besplatno probno razdoblje od 1 mjeseca
ui.panel.config.cloud.login.alert_email_: Prije prijave morate potvrditi svoj e-mail.
ui.panel.config.cloud.forgot_password.in: Unesite svoju e-mail adresu i poslat ćemo vam link za resetiranje lozinke.
ui.panel.config.cloud.forgot_password.ch: Provjerite e-poštu za upute o resetiranju zaporke.
ui.panel.config.cloud.register.title: Registrirajte račun
ui.panel.config.cloud.register.headline: Započnite besplatno probno razdoblje
ui.panel.config.cloud.register.informati: Izradite račun da biste započeli besplatno jednomjesečno probno razdoblje uz Home Assistant Cloud. Nisu potrebni podaci o plaćanju.
Probna verzija će vam omogućiti pristup svim prednostima Home Assistant Clouda, uključujući:
ui.panel.config.cloud.register.feature_w: Jednostavna integracija s aplikacijama temeljenim na webhooku kao što je OwnTracks
ui.panel.config.cloud.register.informati: , tvrtka koju su osnovali osnivači Tvrtke Home Assistant.
Registracijom računa prihvaćate sljedeće uvjete i odredbe.
ui.panel.config.cloud.register.account_c: Račun kreiran! Provjerite svoju e-poštu za upute o aktiviranju računa.
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.thank_you_: Hvala vam što ste dio Home Assistant Clouda. Zahvaljujući ljudima poput vas, u mogućnosti smo napraviti sjajno iskustvo automatizacije doma za svakoga. Hvala vam!
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.sign_out_c: Jeste li sigurni da se želite odjaviti?
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.integratio: Integracije za Home Assistant Cloud omogućuju vam povezivanje s uslugama u oblaku bez potrebe da svoju instancu Home Assistanta izlažete javno na internetu.
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.tts.title: Text to Speech
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.tts.info: Bring personality to your home by having it speak to you by using our Text-to-Speech services. You can use this in automations and scripts by using the {service} service.
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.tts.dialog: Hello {name}, you can play any text on any supported media player!
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.remote.acc: Daljinsko upravljanje je u pripremi. Obavijestit ćemo vas kada bude spremno.
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.remote.inf: Home Assistant Cloud pruža sigurnu daljinsku vezu s vašom instancom dok ste izvan kuće.
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.remote.ins: Vaša će instanca biti dostupna na
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.alexa.info: With the Alexa integration for Home Assistant Cloud you'll be able to control all your Home Assistant devices via any Alexa-enabled device.
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.alexa.enab: Enable the Home Assistant skill for Alexa
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.alexa.info: If you enable state reporting, Home Assistant will send all state changes of exposed entities to Amazon. This allows you to always see the latest states in the Alexa app and use the state changes to create routines.
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.alexa.not_: Prije nego što možete koristiti Alexu, morate aktivirati vještinu Kućnog pomoćnika za Alexu (Home Assistant skill for Alexa) u aplikaciji Alexa.
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.google.inf: With the Google Assistant integration for Home Assistant Cloud you'll be able to control all your Home Assistant devices via any Google Assistant-enabled device.
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.google.htt: Google uređaji neće moći lokalno razgovarati s Home Assistantom jer ste konfigurirali SSL certifikat za svoju HTTP integraciju.
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.google.ena: Activate the Home Assistant Cloud skill for Google Assistant
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.google.inf: Ako omogućite izvješćivanje o stanju, Home Assistant će poslati Googleu sve promjene stanja izloženih entiteta. To ubrzava glasovne naredbe i omogućuje vam da uvijek vidite najnovija stanja u aplikaciji Google.
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.google.ent: Unesite PIN za interakciju sa sigurnosnim uređajima. Sigurnosni uređaji su vrata, garažna vrata i brave. Od vas će se tražiti da izgovorite/unesete ovaj PIN kada komunicirate s takvim uređajima putem Google asistenta.
Unesite PIN za korištenje sigurnosnih uređaja
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.google.not: Before you can use Google Assistant, you need to activate the Home Assistant Cloud skill for Google Assistant in the Google Home app.
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.webhooks.i: Svemu što je konfigurirano da ga pokreće webhook može se dati javno dostupan URL koji vam omogućuje slanje podataka natrag Home Assistantu s bilo kojeg mjesta, bez izlaganja svoje instance internetu.
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.webhooks.n: Čini se da još nemate webhookove. Započnite konfiguriranjem
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.webhooks.l: Saznajte više o stvaranju automatizacija koje pokreće webhook.

ui.panel.config.devices.add_prompt: No {name} have been added using this {type} yet. You can add one by clicking the + button above.
ui.panel.config.devices.caption: Uređaji
ui.panel.config.devices.name: Naziv
ui.panel.config.devices.enabled_descript: Disabled devices will not be shown and entities belonging to the device will be disabled and not added to Home Assistant.
ui.panel.config.devices.automation.no_de: Nema dostupnih automatizacija za ovaj uređaj.
ui.panel.config.devices.cant_edit: Možete uređivati samo stavke stvorene u korisničkom sučelju (UI).
ui.panel.config.devices.confirm_rename_e: Želite li također preimenovati ID entiteta svojih entiteta?
This will not change any configuration (like automations, scripts, scenes, dashboards) that is currently using these entities! You will have to update them yourself to use the new entity IDs!
ui.panel.config.devices.confirm_disable_: There are no more devices for the config entry {entry_name}, do you want to instead disable the config entry?
ui.panel.config.devices.confirm_delete: Are you sure you want to delete this device?
ui.panel.config.devices.confirm_delete_i: Are you sure you want to remove this device from {integration}?
ui.panel.config.entities.caption: Entiteti
ui.panel.config.entities.picker.introduc: Home Assistant drži registar svakog entiteta koji je ikada vidio da se može jedinstveno identificirati. Svaki od tih entiteta imat će dodijeljeni ID entiteta koji će biti rezerviran za samo ovaj entitet.

Koristite registar entiteta da biste nadjačali naziv, promijenili ID entiteta ili uklonili stavku iz Home Assistant. Napomena, uklanjanjem unosa registra entiteta neće se ukloniti entitet. Da biste to učinili, slijedite donju vezu i uklonite je s stranice integracije.
ui.panel.config.entities.picker.enable_s: This will make them available in Home Assistant again if they are now disabled.
ui.panel.config.entities.picker.disable_: Disabled entities will not be added to Home Assistant.
ui.panel.config.entities.picker.remove_s: You should remove them from your dashboard config and automations if they contain these entities.

You can only remove {removable} of the selected {selected} entities. Entities can only be removed when the integration is no longer providing the entities. Sometimes you have to restart Home Assistant before you can remove the entities of a removed integration. Are you sure you want to remove the removable entities?
ui.panel.config.entities.picker.hide_sel: Hidden entities will not be shown on your dashboard. Their history is still tracked and you can still interact with them with services.
ui.panel.config.person.caption: Osobe
ui.panel.config.person.description: Upravljajte osobama koje Home Assistant prati.
ui.panel.config.person.introduction: Here you can add each person of interest in Home Assistant.
ui.panel.config.person.note_about_person: People configured via configuration.yaml cannot be edited via the UI.
ui.panel.config.person.no_persons_create: Looks like you have not added any people yet.

ui.panel.config.person.detail.no_device_: When you have devices that indicate the presence of a person, you will be able to assign them to a person here. You can add your first device by adding a presence-detection integration from the integrations page.

ui.panel.config.zone.caption: Zone
ui.panel.config.zone.description: Upravljajte zonama u kojima želite pratiti osobe.
ui.panel.config.zone.introduction: Zones allow you to specify certain regions on Earth. When a person is within a zone, the state will take the name from the zone. Zones can also be used as a trigger or condition inside automation setups.
ui.panel.config.zone.no_zones_created_ye: Izgleda da još niste stvorili nijednu zonu.
ui.panel.config.zone.confirm_delete: Jeste li sigurni da želite izbrisati ovu zonu?
ui.panel.config.zone.configured_in_yaml: Zone konfigurirane putem configuration.yaml ne mogu se uređivati putem korisničkog sučelja.
ui.panel.config.zone.edit_home_zone: Položaj vašeg doma može se promijeniti u globalnoj konfiguraciji.
ui.panel.config.zone.edit_home_zone_narr: The radius of the Home zone can't be edited from the frontend yet. The location can be changed from the general configuration.
ui.panel.config.zone.home_zone_core_conf: The location of your home zone is editable from the general configuration page. The radius of the Home zone can't be edited from the frontend yet. Do you want to go to the general configuration?
ui.panel.config.zone.detail.name: Naziv
ui.panel.config.zone.detail.icon_error_m: Ikona treba biti u obliku prefiksa: ime ikone, na primjer: mdi: home
ui.panel.config.zone.detail.passive_note: Passive zones are hidden in the frontend and are not used as location for device trackers. This is useful if you just want to use it for automations.

ui.panel.config.integrations.confirm_new: Do you want to set up {integration}?
ui.panel.config.integrations.no_integrat: Seems like you don't have any integrations configured yet. Click on the button below to add your first integration!
ui.panel.config.integrations.note_about_: No integrations matched your search, the integration you want to set up might not be available to set up via the UI yet.
ui.panel.config.integrations.rename_dial: Edit the name of this config entry
ui.panel.config.integrations.ignore.conf: Are you sure you don't want to set up this integration? You can undo this by clicking the 'Show ignored integrations' in the overflow menu on the top right.
This will make the integration appear in your discovered integrations again when it gets discovered. This might require a restart or take some time.
ui.panel.config.integrations.config_entr: Would you like to also remove Application Credentials for this integration?

If you remove them, you will need to enter credentials when setting up the integration again. If you keep them, they will be used automatically when setting up the integration again or may be acccessed from the Application Credentials menu.
Its devices and entities will be permanently deleted.
Ponovo pokrenite Home Assistant da biste dovršili uklanjanje ove integracije

Restart Home Assistant to finish disabling this integration
Restart Home Assistant to finish enabling this integration

ui.panel.config.users.change_password.pa: The password has been changed successfully.
Manage the OAuth Application Credentials used by Integrations

OAuth is used to grant Home Assistant access to information on other websites without giving a passwords. This mechanism is used by companies such as Spotify, Google, Withings, Microsoft, and Twitter.
Setting up {integration} requires configuring application credentials.
Public identifier of the OAuth application
Application Credentials in use by an integration may not be removed.

ui.panel.config.zwave_js.dashboard.intro: Manage your Z-Wave network and Z-Wave devices
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.dashboard.stati: Number of messages successfully sent to the controller
Number of messages successfully received by the controller
Number of messages from the controller that were dropped by the host
Number of outgoing messages that were dropped because they could not be sent
Number of messages that the controller did not accept
Number of collisions while sending a message to the controller
Number of transmission attempts where an ACK was missing from the controller
Number of transmission attempts where the controller response did not come in time
Number of transmission attempts where the controller callback did not come in time
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.node_statistics: # of commands successfully sent to the node
# of commands received from the node, including responses to sent commands
# of outgoing commands that were dropped because they could not be sent
# of commands from the node that were dropped by the host
# of Get-type commands where the node's response did not come in time
Average round-trip-time in ms of commands to this node
Average RSSI in dBm of frames received by this node
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.route_statistic: The used data rate for this route
Which nodes are repeaters for this route and their RSSI
The RSSI of the ACK frame received by the controller
The nodes between which the transmission failed most recently
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.node_config.int: Manage and adjust device specific configuration parameters for the selected device
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.node_config.att: Device configuration parameters and descriptions are provided by the {device_database}
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.node_config.bat: Battery devices must be awake to update their config. Please refer to your device manual for instructions on how to wake the device.
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.node_config.set: The parameter change has been queued, and will be updated when the device wakes up.
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.add_node.title: Add a Z-Wave Device
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.add_node.follow: Follow the directions that came with your device to trigger pairing on the device.
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.add_node.choose: How do you want to add your device
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.add_node.qr_cod: If your device supports SmartStart you can scan the QR code for easy pairing.
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.add_node.inclus: The device could not be added.
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.add_node.check_: Please check the logs for more information.
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.add_node.provis: The device has been added. Once you power it on, it will become available.
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.add_node.interv: The device is being interviewed. This may take some time.
The device interview failed. Additional information may be available in the logs.
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.provisioned.con: Jeste li sigurni da želite deaktivirati uređaj?
Ako deaktivirate uređaj, neće biti dodan u Home Assistant kada se uključi. Ako je već dodan u Home Assistant, uklanjanjem dodijeljenog uređaja neće se ukloniti iz Home Assistant.
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.security_classe: Like S2 Authenticated, but without verification that the correct device is included
Example: Lighting, Sensors and Security Systems
Example: Door Locks and Garage Doors
Example: Legacy Door Locks without S2 support
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.remove_node.int: Remove a device from your Z-Wave network, and remove the associated device and entities from Home Assistant.
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.remove_node.con: Your Z-Wave controller is now in exclusion mode.
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.remove_node.fol: Follow the directions that came with your device to trigger exclusion on the device.
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.remove_node.exc: The device could not be removed. Please check the logs for more information.
Device {id} has been removed from your Z-Wave network.
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.remove_failed_n: Remove a failed device from your Z-Wave network. Use this if you are unable to exclude a device normally because it is broken.
The device removal is in progress.
Device {id} has been removed from your Z-Wave network.
The device could not be removed from your Z-Wave network.
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.reinterview_nod: Re-interview a device on your Z-Wave network. Use this feature if your device has missing or incorrect functionality.
You will need to wake battery powered devices before starting the re-interview. Refer to your device's manual for instructions on how to wake the device.
You can close this dialog and the interview will continue in the background.
The device is being interviewed. This may take some time.
The device interview failed. Additional information may be available in the logs.
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.heal_network.in: Start a network heal on your Z-Wave network. A network heal will cause all devices to re-calculate their routes back to the controller and is recommended if you have recently moved devices or your controller.
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.heal_network.tr: The healing process generates a large amount of traffic on the Z-Wave network. This may cause devices to respond slowly (or not at all) while the heal is in progress.
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.heal_network.in: Network healing is in progress. This will take some time.
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.heal_network.ru: You can close this dialog and the network healing will continue in the background.
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.heal_network.he: Healing failed. Additional information may be available in the logs.
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.heal_node.title: Heal a Z-Wave Device
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.heal_node.intro: Tell {device} to update its routes back to the controller. This can help with communication issues if you have recently moved the device or your controller.
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.heal_node.traff: The healing process generates a large amount of traffic on the Z-Wave network. This may cause devices to respond slowly (or not at all) while the heal is in progress.
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.heal_node.heali: Additional information may be available in the logs.
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.heal_node.netwo: A Z-Wave network heal is already in progress. Please wait for it to finish before healing an individual device.
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.update_firmware: WARNING: Firmware updates can brick your device if you do not correctly follow the manufacturer's guidance. The Home Assistant and Z-Wave JS teams do not take any responsibility for any damages to your device as a result of the firmware update and will not be able to help you if you brick your device. Would you still like to continue?
Select the firmware file you would like to use to update {device}.
Select the firmware target (0 for the Z-Wave chip, ≥1 for other chips if they exist) for this update, or uncheck the box to have the driver attempt to figure it out from the firmware file.
The firmware update is ready to be sent to {device} but the device is asleep, wake the device to start the update.
If you close this dialog, the update will continue to be queued in the background and start automatically once the device wakes up.
The firmware update should start being sent to {device} shortly.
If you close this dialog, the update will continue in the background.
The firmware update on {device} is in progress ({progress}%).
Are you sure you want to abort the firmware update on {device}?
To attempt the firmware update again, select the new firmware file you would like to use.
The firmware update is complete! If you want to attempt another firmware update on this device, please wait until it gets re-interviewed.
